May 15, 1920 D Penygroes Contest (Class C)
Penygroes Contest (Class C) 30 Test Piece Contest Penygroes Contest penygroes-contest-class-c

The Maid of Orleans [Laurent]
Penygroes, Llanelli, Carmarthenshire Prizes - 1st £8 and cup, 2nd £4, 3rd £2. Best cornet, trombone and euphonium - Skewen. 3 bands competed.
Oct. 12, 2018, 8:06 p.m. Oct. 12, 2018, 8:49 p.m.
